msbt.message: Was that the last of 'em? Nice. Thanks a million, !Even though I can barely feel 'em, getting rid of all those fleas is a huge weight off, !
Having fleas is pretty badbut on the bright side, now I know I'm not allergic to these rad clothes.Thanks for the assist, !
UGHHHH! You're telling me I had FLEAS?! No wonder everyone was keeping their distance.Then againif they didn't want me at my itchiest, they don't deserve me at my best, .
I had fleas? Huh! I didn't even feel 'em yet.You've got a good eye for spotting 'em! Maybe you can check my teeth while you're at it, !
Whew. I almost forgot what it was like not to itch all the time. Good thing you're around, !
Fleas, huh? I should've guessed as soon as I felt the itch.Anyway, good looking out. I'd have been in for some itchy nights without you having my back, .
